column4: Real quick . . . does anyone know where the music app "Amarok" stores it's SQLite DataBase File?  in the $Home Dir???
for future reference, it's in '~/.kde/share/apps/amarok/collection.db'  thanks for the great lead, found it fast. THANKS!
weird place. if you use it a lot, make a symlink in ~/ something like .amarok so its hidden and easily accessible
